TopicTitle: Hello, my fellow astronauts and engineers

Articles.Content:
I used to be a lurker, for quite a bit of time(since 0.9, hey that rhymes). I was introduced to this game by the amazing man and LPer, Jefmajor, who livestreamed this game before it became as popular as it is.

I have already done a little bit in this community, I dipped my foot in some roleplay, tried to show my poor rocket creation skills, later I showed off some of my C7 creations, and recently I\'ve been posting in off topic and very recently created the plugin organization thread.

I own Spork Aerospace Industries on the roleplay forum(Which I will revive soon, trust me, and I\'ll come back with a bang).

I try to be friendly, and I hope I\'ll be able to not start fights.

I haven\'t bought the game yet . I hope I will very soon, as I am very excited to play with persistance.

And, I guess that\'s a sufficient introduction.

So let me close with, hello all, and thank you for the so far warm welcome.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
